trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Charlotte
There were no other sightings in Charlotte on or around December 25th 2011
Summary: Very red, west to east travel, no noise
divs: Sighting DetailsClose to an airport all my life, never seen anything with all red lights and no sound. See planes all the time, tried to call my wife out look at it. Did not report until I saw someone reported. Don't know what it was, but very different than normal.
